title: The 20 Questions That Didn’t Make the Survey - The After Show
itunes:title: The 20 Questions That Didn’t Make the Survey - The After Show
description:
We are doing our annual listener survey now. These are the 20 questions that didn’t make it on the survey for one reason or another.

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at https://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
